item.title: Gail Slater Is The Perfect Pick To Lead The Trump DOJ’s Fight Against Big Tech
item.description: Everyone across the political spectrum — except, of course, tech giants and their paid shills in D.C. — should welcome the nomination of Gail Slater.

item.title: Venezuelan Busted For Extorting Illegals In PA Exposes Evil Side Effect Of Biden’s Open Borders
item.description: One immigration expert referred to it as 'new age slavery' that traps people in a spiral of debt.

item.title: Reining In Federal Spending Must Start With The Executive Branch
item.description: For years going on decades, presidents of both parties have used executive action to spend money Congress never fully authorized.

item.title: Four Ways Trump Can Scrap Biden’s ‘Equity’ Discrimination And Promote Real Equality
item.description: There are at least four steps Trump can take immediately to make good on campaign promises to vanquish DEI from the federal bureaucracy.

item.title: People Who Fought In Afghanistan Know Why Nation-Building Was Never Going To Work
item.description: In Afghanistan, tribalism is at a virtually unparalleled level. Westerners have no idea how deeply disturbing that tribalism can be.
